comment: Finally someone advocating for breast cancer screenings. Prostate cancer kills more people, but the constant pleas for men to be screened, and the awareness campaigns, and ribbons are getting really tiresome.
amr:
# ::snt Finally someone advocating for breast cancer screenings. Prostate cancer kills more people, but the constant pleas for men to be screened, and the awareness campaigns, and ribbons are getting really tiresome.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / someone
            :ARG0-of (a / advocate-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / screen-01
                        :ARG3 (d / disease
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "cancer")
                              :mod (b / breast))))
            :mod (f / final))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG0 (d2 / disease
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "prostate"
                              :op2 "cancer"))
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :quant (m2 / more)))
            :ARG2 (t / tire-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p2 / plead-01
                              :ARG2 s2
                              :ARG1 (m3 / man))
                        :frequency (c2 / constant))
                  :op2 (c3 / campaign-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / awareness))
                  :op3 (r / ribbon))
            :degree (r2 / really)))
